abstract: Police in Ireland arrest six men with links to dissident republican groups during raids conducted ahead of visit by Prince Charles of Britain and his wife Camilla Parker Bowles; also find firearms and pipe bombs, which were defused by military.
lead_paragraph: Based on intelligence, the police carried out raids and found items including a firearms and pipe bombs that were defused by the military.

headline.main: Ireland Makes Arrests and Finds Bombs Before Visit by Prince Charles
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Europe; Ireland: Police Raids Before Royal Visit

snippet: Based on intelligence, the police carried out raids and found items including a firearms and pipe bombs that were defused by the military.
